description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Zombies Outback - Survive and make it to the other end of the city with your M9 & AK. You wish dayz like these didn't exist, with no where to hide, your ears and your eyes are the only first aid. Warning, gore and blood from an excessive number of zombies.
